mapper.select: select ss.stu_id as stuId,ss.stu_name as stuName,ss.stu_sex as stuSex,ss.stu_password as password,ss.stu_birthday as birthday, ss.dorm_name as dormName,st.teacher_name as teacherName,sc.class_name as className from school_student ss left join school_teacher st on ss.pk_teacher_id=st.teacher_id and st.is_deleted=0 left join school_class sc on ss.pk_class_id=sc.class_id and sc.is_deleted=0 where ss.is_deleted=0;
